attributes.additional_details: There has been no vote on the matter and we feel a decision of this size, impact & cost should be decided through a referendum rather than a politician.
attributes.background: We the people would like our Westminster government to end Mark Drakefords plans for Wales to become a nation of sanctuary.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:

https://petitions.senedd.wales/

Decisions on the legality of any policy is a matter for the courts.
